thread.title: Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas Among Travel + Leisure 2015 World’s Best, Ranking #15 Among Large City Hotels In The Continental US
thread.title_full: Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas Among Travel + Leisure 2015 World’s Best, Ranking #15 Among Large City Hotels In The Continental US

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas Among Travel + Leisure 2015 World’s Best, Ranking #15 Among Large City Hotels In The Continental US
text:
Email 
Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas was named one of the 2015 World’s Best Hotels by Travel + Leisure magazine. The hotel ranked #15 among the magazine’s Top 25 Large City Hotels in the Continental US. It was the only Las Vegas hotel included. 
The World’s Best Awards are the result of Travel + Leisure magazine’s annual readers’ survey, which ranks hotels, cities, cruise lines, spas, airlines and more. Hotels are ranked based on guest rooms and facilities, location, service, restaurants and food and overall value. 
“Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas is honoured to be among Travel + Leisure magazine’s prestigious listing of premiere hotels,” says Mark Hellrung , General Manager. “The magazine’s readers are experienced and sophisticated travellers. The fact that the list resulted from their feedback makes the distinction especially gratifying.” 
Reservations at Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas may be booked online . Share this:
